member.name: M:MbUnit.Framework.OldAssert.ObjectsEqual(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Used to compare numeric types. Comparisons between same types are fine (Int32 to Int32, or Int64 to Int64), but the Equals method fails across different types. This method was added to allow any numeric type to be handled correctly, by using ToString and comparing the result
member.param: The expected value.
The actual value.
